Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • muzaffar.shapes.Shape
      • muzaffar.shapes.Shape2D
        • muzaffar.shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends Shape2D
    This class represents a simple circle class
    Author:
    rmuzaffar862

      • Fields inherited from class muzaffar.shapes.Shape2D

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle()
      creates new Circle object with default parameter: x, y, width, and height are all set to zero
      Circle(double x, double y, double width, double height, java.awt.Color fillColor, java.awt.Color strokeColor, int strokeWidth)
      Creates a new instance of a Circle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.

      • Circle

        public Circle()

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double width,
              double height,
              java.awt.Color fillColor,
              java.awt.Color strokeColor,
              int strokeWidth)
        Creates a new instance of a Circle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Parameters:
        x - sets x coordinate of ellipse to passed in x
        y - sets y coordinate of ellipse to passed in y
        width - sets width of ellipse to passed in width
        height - sets height of ellipse to passed in height
        fillColor - sets the fillColor of the

      • rotate90

        public Circle rotate90()
        Description copied from class: Shape2D
        Returns new Shape2D rotated on the center 90 degrees. The width and height are switched and the centerpoint remains the same.

        Parameters:
